website_summaries.verdict: The X750F series is an all-around great entry point to premium 4K gaming and video streaming, and while it doesn’t have as many bonus features, its price is well-worth it if you simply need a stellar 4K display.
pros: Smart TV powered by Android TV
4K X-Reality PRO upscales your image to near 4K-quality
ClearAudio+ delivers an immersive surround sound effect
cons: Doesn’t include some excellent Sony TV technology, such as X-Motion Clarity, a picture processor, and TRILUMINOS Display

customer_reviews.title: sony KD65X750F Broken screen delivered
customer_reviews.text: Got the sony KD65X750F after it was replaced due to a cracked screen earlier and unfortunately, this is cracked as well. The unit is so big, I had to carry it back to deliver it to amazon. Really unhappy with the shipping standards of this device.
customer_reviews.author: Bl

customer_reviews.title: First one came broken, the second one is alright.
customer_reviews.text: The TV arrived broken. The return was a fairly big hassle, but eventually got one that worked. It works fairly well. Amazon, Netflix, YouTube are all easy to use. The Chromecast connection is very useful, the Bluetooth, however, doesn't work with my Android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank O.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Sharp Picture
customer_reviews.text: After spending about 2 hours listening to a lady at the big box electronics super mega store ramble on and on and on about different televisions I somehow convinced my husband to follow me home so that we could see what Amazon had to offer. We spent approximately 30 minutes looking at televisons before we came across this model. We have been completely happy with our purchase. The picture and clarity is superb. The sound is great, but could have slightly more oomph. We will consider getting a flat sound bar in the future. A great televison with lots of options to customize.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Cracked!
customer_reviews.text: Should have believed the reviews on the poor shipping. The tv came well packaged but the screen is broken internally. Ive always used Sony but now I’m wondering how delicate the screen and how long it could last. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is superb BUT Smart Features/Tv Processor are painfully slow.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the picture, but the speed of navigating the menus and load times are super sluggish. Also, for some reason, the tv's wifi connection will drop out every now and then and I'll have to turn it off and back on under network settings for it to resume. For the price it's great, and I refuse to complain! However, if I spent $1,000+ on this TV's I would be pretty pissed. Pros: - Beautiful Picture (4K HD) - Easy to set up out of the box (read the directions though) - Cost Cons: - Sluggish smart features - Spotty wifi connectivity
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I've been a devoted Sony customer since the '80s and so far - they have once again exceeded expectations! Beautiful picture, works well with Alexa and PS3. Also has all the apps needed for us as cord cutters (Plex and Tablo) and lots of fun features as well (I imagine that many of the voice commands and convenience features are not Sony specific but they all work very well). Assuming this one lasts as long as each of our previous Sony's work I am 100% satisfied. Update 11/23/19 still 100% satisfied! Would recommend without hesitation and the picture quality still Wows me!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Like the TV but nuts and bolts missing
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this TV. However, the bolts and nuts we're not included in the package as shown on packing list. Had to go to hardware store and "jerryrig" in order to attach the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good tv, over taken by ads.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy a Sony android tv until they quit shoving ads down your throat on the home screen. I don’t know if it’s a Sony problem or android, but when the ads take up more real estate than the content does on a $1000 tv, that’s a problem.
customer_reviews.author: bproctor

customer_reviews.title: bleeding light
customer_reviews.text: Look at the top of the screen. You see a line of light and a circle of light at the ends. This TV NO.1. NO. 2 is not much better. Even with this defect, this is the best Television in this price range Amazon has. I would not buy a TV from any body else.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Bad Tv made by Sony
customer_reviews.text: Bad 4ktv made by Sony.Sony usually makes great tvs but the picture on this one is poor.Its a lower price Sony but for a cheaper cost you can get a Vizio 65"4k that looks way better.The contrast is terrible,the picture is too bright with little control over it.The motion sync is messed up as well.The menu is a headache to navigate just to obtain a semi decent picture.Pure garbage Vizio and lg 4ks have way better picture for way less.Youll only get a good Sony by spending 2 gz.
customer_reviews.author: bdawg

customer_reviews.title: the most important thing for me was being another sony.my other 46inch sony lasted 9yrs 4 months .
customer_reviews.text: the best thing i like it was at a great price when i bought mine 31days ago.i checked every store on TVs EBAY,no body was even close to price. i saved probably $400 with free shipping..i seen the tv has gone up $50.00 so the timing was great for me for home viewing.the imput jacks were located in a better spot and much lighter.hope i can get 9 yrs like my other one.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Total disrespect!
customer_reviews.text: bought this TV during the amazon prime day, the price was very good. when I received the item the TV was with the screen cracked all over. was so disappointed, I returned the item the next day and after 2 weeks amazon reply me that they will just refund the value. I don't want the value! I want the TV in perfect shape, the way I bought it with the price that I bought it. because now I can not buy the same product due to the price is back to the normal value. this seems more like a scam than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: When ordering this product I initially received a defective unit... The second one I got was excellent! It certainly performs better than you could expect for a TV in this price range. I like how Android TV is integrated and functions flawlessly! When I was shopping for it, one of the things I liked the most was the simple and elegant design (Sony is know for). I have no complains and cannot be more satisfied. If my place was more elegantly decorated, I could have went for one of the more premium models, but this one does the trick (especially with how technology becomes obsolete faster these days).
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got it off the treasure truck for 399.99 and it's a great value for that price. It's got a good picture quality, easy to set the stand up for it and its not too bulky or heavy. My only complaint is that there's a bit of lag on the smart features at times and there's no support for new apps. It has pre-loaded apps like Hulu and Netflix and quite a few others, but if there was some other app you wanted that it didn't already come with your out of luck. For the price this is a fantastic TV, I'd give it 3.5 stars if I was paying $800 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Bad dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Plastic Screen with bunch of dead pixels right in the middle lower border. Not even stuck pixels but completely dead. The plastic screen seems to be coming apart or delaminated in the lower screen bezel right next to the Sony emblem, I can stick on quarter in it. Not gonna bother returning it, more trouble than its worth.
customer_reviews.author: ekfliu

customer_reviews.title: Purchased off the Tresure Truck
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't lookin to buy this model, but when I received an alert the Tresure Truck had the 49 inch model for $399 and did some quick research and secured the purchase. This TV has many features I was looking for (4 HDMI Ports, 4K, built in Apps). I can already watch Amazon Prime and Netflix vi my X1 box, but having the app already on the tv allows me to watch 4K content. This TV is used in the gameroom to Play PS4 and Switch as well as some sporting events like baseball. No artifacts. Not a perfect tv, but a great deal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable Sony
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 55 inch set by UPS. Not a scratch on the box, arrived perfect condition. I don't stream, I use for cable box and Sony x700 4k player only. After a couple months use and direct comparison with my old 46 inch Sony which still works good after 10 years hard use, ( yes I can direct compare having 2 cable boxes side by side) I can say motion handling is better, color is better. If I mute the TV it also mutes my optical-out to my 7.1 surround sound system (good!) This is a lot of TV set for not a lot of money. Happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: albows

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking 4K Images
customer_reviews.text: Considering this TV was an upgrade from the same TV I had in college (10 years ago), I’m throughly impressed! The image quality is second to none. I think the Android TV user interface could use some refinement, but it doesn’t take away from the value or quality of the product. My one complaint is about the TV’s remote. It feels like it’s constructed poorly. Whenever you handle it or press any of the keys, especially on the directional pad, the remote makes excessive ‘plastic-on-plastic’ squeaking noise. I’ve been using the Android TV app in place of the provided remote.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge fan of Android, but as far as picture quality, you can't beat Sony.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Sony TV I've purchased in the last 10 years, and I have yet to be disappointed. Sony tends to be a little more expensive than other brands, when it comes to TVs, like most things, you get what you pay for. The picture is very good, although the blacks are a little on the grey side, they are totally acceptable for a TV of this size in this price range. The build quality is good too; it's plastic but is sturdy and doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tim in St. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Delivered July 22nd. Worked great. Went to turn it on tonight for Christmas to watch a movie with the kiddos and all I get is a black screen. Nothing I’ve tried is fixing it. First time I turned it on I got sound but no picture. I turned it off and back on again and now I get nothing. So disappointed to have spent so much money on this only to have it fail five months later. Amazon only gives you 30 days to return so now I’m out a tv and a whole lot of money and I have five very sad kids on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of android tv’s or Sony smart features
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say the picture quality is excellent. The problem I am having is with android features. So many button presses to do simple features. Linked the tv to Alexa but that only works half the time. And playing media files via usb.... haven’t been able to do that yet. Sony makes things so difficult compared to Samsung tv’s. Personally, I’ll keep this tv since it’s just in my bedroom but my main tv has to be a Samsung. They are sooooo much better and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I Was Really Excited At First
customer_reviews.text: But I’ve noticed it lags a bit when I press buttons to select different options. Also it’s a pain to set the sleep timer. Other TVs have that button on the remote. With this TV you have to press several buttons and dig through menus to get to it. Kind of a pain when you’re ready for bed. Great picture. But just a little laggy. I’ve had this TV less than a year and it keeps shutting off by its self after 5 mins and I didn’t change any settings. I strongly do not recommend buying this TV.
customer_reviews.author: PrinnyDoll

customer_reviews.title: Sony quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Sony loyalist because I consistently receive a quality product for a slightly higher price than lesser brands. Great picture, great functionality—even the sound isn’t bad for a flat panel-I use in bedroom & no need for sound bar system. In a larger room I’d probably recommend one though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a SONY
customer_reviews.text: TV worked when it arrived and still works. Picture quality is great but I have to get used to how these new TVs look compared to my old HDTV rear projection SXRD set. I just wish Prime video and Hulu came preinstalled - I hate making accounts with Google just to add programs to the TV.
customer_reviews.author: J. D HUNT

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets- at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was sooooo hesitant go make the purchase but I’m so glad I did. I upgraded from a “4K” TCL roku tv-the difference is like night and day. This tv is MUCH better. Beware the box is heavy when delivered. Works great with a RoKu ultra box. The only thing I’m having problems with is playing files from USB stick I have.
customer_reviews.author: michelle s

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I guess I expected better picture quality from a 4K television. But for the price I got it for, I definitely can live with it. I do love how the smart tv connects all the different apps. From PS4 to my Apple TV to Netflix to Prime videos and YouTube, it’s all seamlessly connected. Speakers could be better. I will need to add a sound bar to complete the experience. Overall I am satisfied with the purchase. Thanks Prime Days!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken!
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this Amazon Prime Day special. Great deal....but so disappointing to see how it ended up. Packaging looked fine, but top of the TV was actually pulled away from the glass, and the glass was broken. Such a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Sony!
customer_reviews.text: This is our primary TV in the living room. My Dad was a Sony lover, in fact we have his last one in our bedroom, he passed 10 years ago and it's still going strong. He was a believer in Sony and the quality of their products. I am also a believer.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl phillips

customer_reviews.title: Worth the deal.
customer_reviews.text: Small bezel, a wide and sturdy footing, and nice picture. I paid $500 for this television on prime day, and at that price it was very worth it. However, I'm not sure I'd give such a high rating if I had paid the full asking price of $750. The options were a bit too 'user friendly' and lacked the depth I would have liked as someone with experience fine-tuning a display. Finally, I was very pleased with the I/O features, including both a fibre-optic audio out as well as a 3.5mm aux audio port for customers who do not have a new sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So I broke my TV and sadly Sony discontinued it so I bought this one. For the money it has everything and more than you are looking for. Definitely recommend if you're looking for smart features.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Multiple things wrong within 1 year of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a year ago and I've had two things go wrong with it. Some kind of internal power supply died, which was replaced under warranty and now it won't receive a signal from the remote (I have two remotes and neither of them work on the TV, one of which works fine on another device). Very strange to have two major things within one year and it is making me question the quality of Sony products.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B Haynes

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tv. It’s not the most user friendly tv out there, but usually people who buy Somy have some tech knowledge. Will buy Somy the next time I purchase another tv.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV is incredible! We replaced an old SONY Bravo with this one and were impressed and amazed by the improved picture quality. The older TV already had incredible quality, so we didn't know how much of a difference we'd see. It feels like you're right there with the characters on screen. I highly recommend this TV!
customer_reviews.author: famousamy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this TV. Fantastic picture, Android TV is awesome, and it fits perfectly in my place. Had 2 broken units at first, but I think it was UPS breaking them in shipping. But Amazon was awesome and got me replacements quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Won't Turn On
customer_reviews.text: Barely used the TV because it never wants to turn on. To turn on the TV, I have to keep unplugging it from the outlet and plugging it back in. I don't consider that a very "smart" TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture! Power issues in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This TV looks great. Unfortunately after a few months, the TV won't power on. It has to be unplugged and plugged back in. Looking into this, it is a known issue for Sony TVs. Unfortunately there are many troubleshooting steps with Sony before repair will be considered. Their operating hours are my work hours. I would not recommend this or any other Sony TV based on my customer service and product experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in all brilliant TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, clear picture, decent sound (better than some not as great as others), fantastic options with the apps...only not great bit is the remote. It seems to not react with the TV as well as others we have had in the past, but it still works at the moment just hard to imagine it will last long. It does work though hence still giving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Ives

customer_reviews.title: Defective screen
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this TV..i did not bother about negative review on broken screen but i guess im one of the unlucky ones to have a defective screen. When i took out of the box i was so happy no visible crack..but when I turned it on theres a green line running vertically on the screen..sad. I already requested for a replacement..lets see what will I get next. I wish Amazon has a pickup service for heavy items
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: Have had this TV for 4 months without any problems. The smart features on this TV are excellent and easy to use. Definitely recommend as a mid range flat screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is outstanding. A sturdy television. Arrived on time. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie O

customer_reviews.title: quality ?
customer_reviews.text: very good picture, fast shipping. good service. UPDATES In the process of delivery. Received fast.
customer_reviews.author: jose r cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Garbage TV
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Had it for one year and it will not turn on. Has sat on a mount the entire time we have owned it so I don't understand how this could happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was one of the lucky ones because my TV arrived and broken. They recommend to people to set up but I did it by myself just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: Sony 43' smart TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and i was treated excellent by the seller. Give them your business.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Boy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: So this was delivered today a day earlier than expected which was awesome to start. Set up was super easy. Setting up the tv controls and programs was a breeze. Picture quality is amazing when your watching newer shows and movies. Tried watching something from like 2001 and it’s just not that great but neither was the technology 18 years ago. Overall we love the television.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I already own the 75" Bravia so I knew what I was getting with the Sony 55". It is everything I expected. Very nice TV.
customer_reviews.author: JJV

customer_reviews.title: Android OS
customer_reviews.text: Tv as a whole is ok. Picture quality and value are not bad. The OS well could be better. It’s a bit slow and clunky. Also HBO Go will not work if you have Xfinity/Comcast.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tv we've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tv. the features are abundant and the resolution is very good. Purchased on prime day - great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jpaul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and picture
customer_reviews.text: Sony is known for quality and Amazon is known for great deals. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Givo

customer_reviews.title: Tom:s TV
customer_reviews.text: Our new Sony TV has excellent quality and sound. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality and a Good Value for your Money
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I expected and then some . Sleek design quality picture smart tv
customer_reviews.author: Homegirl93662

customer_reviews.title: We love our Smart TV!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and very clear picture with great color! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Loving my 1st Smart TV.
customer_reviews.text: Great lightning deal on Prime Day! This TV is awesome and has a great picture. The apps are great also.
customer_reviews.author: Delowishes

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Thank GOD i didnt get the problems like delivered broke, hardware missing, etc. I dont know why they got it like that but mine is fine, the quality is great just what i need, and i wouldnt really know about the software and smart features since i mostly use the fire cube and my ps4 and its great.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and smart remote
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can not beat the picture. Nice remote with easy access to the smart TV options.
customer_reviews.author: jim reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for $499 on prime week What a steal
customer_reviews.author: J21131

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and screen was cracked. Initiated a replacement via amazon and allegedly the “seller cannot exchange product”. Not happy! We were very excited about this television.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great TV took alittle longer than I expected but the staff at video audio was helpfull and got it right to me.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN AND MIRIAM STOREY

customer_reviews.title: Go to a store to purchase a tv.
customer_reviews.text: The tv arrived with a rip/puncture in front of box. Then once it was turned on a very noticeable bright white strip eliminated from the top of the screen about 8 inches long. Under the that strip on both sides when the screen should be black it was grey and gradually faded to black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOO HOO
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal during prime days and could not be happier. This tv has made my life complete!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality but poor O/S
customer_reviews.text: The O/S is so poorly designed and its so slow to change TV channels, at least 5 or 10 seconds between channels. Sometimes the TV won’t start and I have to physically unplug to reset it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great picture - works well with others
customer_reviews.text: The nicest surprise about this TV was how well it works with my other devices (phone, speakers, Cable). Great picture, the TV speakers are way better than my previous TV. The smart features are easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Sony is junk DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: first TV I bought from Sony and it doesn't even work. I'm returning immediately and sticking to Samsung they never let me down. Sony is under warranty and they think I'm waiting 7-10 days for a replacement no way rather have my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C.

customer_reviews.title: State of art built in speakers
customer_reviews.text: I returned my soundbar. Useless with these excellent built in speakers. Nice job Sony 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: ALT.

customer_reviews.title: Ok asking too much questions
customer_reviews.text: Great Tv! Wish there was Spotify app, not sure if there is one
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV! Easy to set up. Using this in the bedroom as a 2nd TV. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Happy customer! My hubby needed a new big tv for a man cave remodel. Great picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: sp75494

customer_reviews.title: Good TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: The TV is fine. Easy to set up. Don't like the picture as well as the 7 year old, 60" Samsung plasma it replaced but for the price it is OK.
customer_reviews.author: chiennoir wine

customer_reviews.title: Soectrumtv app not available
customer_reviews.text: Not the best app store as I thought. Spectrum tv app cannot be downloaded while Samsung t4v can? Good picture quality but I've seen better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!  Great Buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Picture was very clear. Easy to set up and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: pj_cincykid

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. Sharp clear picture with beautiful colors and contrast. We bought it this summer during Amazon prime days. It pairs nicely with our sound system to give a theater like feeling. We've always been happy with Sonys in the past and this one doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The best tv I’ve ever purchased! I love it and glad I snatched this up!
customer_reviews.author: Mjr

customer_reviews.title: Sony TV
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, box was in excellent condition, took TV out and set up, moment of truth and ................. AWESOME This TV is what I needed, Thanks to Amazon and Sony for best service 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Brett Needham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv love the colors and quality of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: The tv came cracked so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L Magiera

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tv great picture. Bought it as a lightning deal for an outstanding price.
customer_reviews.author: KingFish

customer_reviews.title: Need better assembly information
customer_reviews.text: They need to make the assembly instructions clearer for the “feet” or legs... not very helpful and rather frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tv screen not aligned with frame.
customer_reviews.text: I got the tv with a tv screen that is not aligned with the tv frame. You can see a light coming out from the top of the screen. It needs to be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The picture is sharp. Best TV I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: pamela k hoffman

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We like the television very much. It arrived undamaged, and was very easy to set up. We enjoy it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Nancys Steiskal

customer_reviews.title: Smart tv. Sony made.
customer_reviews.text: Has all the apps I need. Works well. Great picture!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey L Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tv!! Love it! Had to turn off the motion setting though. Im sure its great for sports though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Oscarson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV for the price with PIP and voice remote
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price.Special thanks to Amazon for fast and safety delivery. TV looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: shavo9

customer_reviews.title: It’s a defective model
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered a defective piece. When they replaced it, I again received the defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Ankita

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've always dreamed of, an android tv that casts with my phone!\ Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of picture, easy software . Poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous picture quality and you can’t beat the price (got it during prime day event)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Egan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged screen
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed and setup TV and there was a crack in the screen and damage to the box when arrived. Not happy

customer_reviews.title: cracked upon arrival

customer_reviews.text: Great tv. The blacks are more gray but the overall color and clarity make up fir that.

customer_reviews.author: VeroSarcina

customer_reviews.title: Solid investment!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is just what the doctor ordered. Loaded with options, infinite how many there are. This model looks flawless (right out of the box). No need to modify the picture any at all + The receiver I use (SONY) converted to this tv by itself !! Adjusted into a VERY sharp surround sound for my entertainment center. No need to adjust my receiver levels any either. One thing worth mentioning is that the screen is 44X24. Strong recommendation to get yourself one of these AWESOME TV'S
customer_reviews.author: ~*JONAS*~

customer_reviews.title: Sony 55” Tv
customer_reviews.text: I would like to replace this 55” Sony Tv because when it was shipped to me. That’s because it was damaged and I just want a replacement is all. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Jay McNeely

product_meta.title: Sony KD65X750F 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV
product_meta.description: Size:65-Inch| Style:TVEnjoy crisp, sharp details in your favorite content with the X750F 4K HDR LED TV. Control your environment with your voice using Android TV with Google Assistant. 4K X Reality PRO technology and Dynamic Contrast Enhancer technologies refine details and display contrast with stunning accuracy, making shows and movies come alive.
feature_bullets: Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 57 5/8 x 33 1/4 x 3 1/4(1 3/4) inch, TV with stand: 57 5/8 x 35 3/4 x 14 inch
Pairs 4K Ultra HD picture clarity with the contrast, color, and detail of High Dynamic Range (HDR) for the most lifelike picture
Upscale to a more natural picture with 4K X Reality PRO. Power Consumption (in Operation): 96 Watt
Scenes appear more realistic with Dynamic Contrast Enhancer
Voice control your TV with Amazon Alexa compatibility; Android TV with Google Assistant technology gives you a genius TV
Content appears with lifelike motion with Motionflow XR technology
In the box: TV, Stands, Remote controller, Batteries, Power adapter, IR blaster, Quick start up guide, Manual
